title: How to Make Hot Cocoa on Animal Jam

steps.headline: Head over to Mt.
steps.description: Shiveer. Click the world map at the bottom right of your screen and go to Mt. Shiveer, which should be around the top left of the map. If you already have a hot cocoa maker in your den, this is optional.

steps.headline: Go to the cocoa hut located in Mt.
steps.description: Shiveer. It will be the building with the purple tent-like roof with patches on it. It's located around the bottom left of where you spawn when you go to Mt. Shiveer by map. Again, if you have a hot cocoa maker in your den, that works as well.

steps.headline: Click the remote control button beside the hot cocoa making machine.
steps.description: It should be in a floating diamond next to the machine.

steps.headline: Click on the cup shape and pattern of your choice.
Click on the color you wish to use.
Drag the lever to one of the three colors at the bottom left of the machine.
steps.description: This controls the heat of your cocoa. Green is the coolest temperature of cocoa you can get, yellow is medium temperature, and red is the highest temperature. Click on the color of your choice to drag the lever.

steps.headline: Choose what kind of cocoa you want.
Choose between two choices of toppings on the left side.
steps.description: You can choose from either whipped cream or marshmallows.

steps.headline: Choose your top-toppings.
Enjoy!
steps.description: Your hot cocoa will appear right by your animal.
